This follows Bihar's own caste census conducted between 2022 and 2023, which revealed that Extremely Backward Classes and Other Backward Classes constitute a significant 63% of the state's population.

title: IND vs ENG: India, England players observe minute's silence, wear black armbands
content: In a poignant tribute, the India and England cricket teams honored the 274 victims of the Ahmedabad air disaster with a minute's silence and black armbands at Headingley. The tragic crash, claiming the lives of Indian and British citizens, deeply affected both teams as they commenced their five-Test series.

title: 16 billion passwords leaked: Facebook, Instagram, Gmail & other accounts affected
content: A massive data breach has exposed 16 billion login credentials across 30 databases, impacting users of major platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Gmail. Researchers discovered the unprecedented leak, revealing fresh, weaponizable intelligence for cybercriminals. Experts urge immediate password changes, multi-factor authentication, and monitoring of accounts to mitigate potential exploitation.

title: India vs England 1st Test: Why June 20 means so much to Indian cricket
content: June 20th continues to be a significant date for Indian Test debuts as Sai Sudharsan received his Test Cap No. 317 against England at Headingley. Following in the footsteps of Dravid, Ganguly, and Kohli, Sudharsan, the IPL 2025 Orange Cap winner, steps into a rebuilding Indian side at No. 3.

title: Air India fares drop after Boeing 787 crash
content: Following the Air India Boeing 787 Dreamliner crash, fares have significantly decreased on both domestic and international routes, with some routes experiencing drops of up to 24%. Air India CEO Campbell Wilson stated that the crashed aircraft had undergone recent checks and monitoring, showing no prior issues.

title: Why Israel-Iran conflict is ripping MAGA apart
content: As tensions with Iran escalate, Donald Trump faces a rebellion within his own MAGA coalition. Once united by promises to end ‚Äústupid wars,‚Äù the movement is now split between anti-war voices like Tucker Carlson, Steve Bannon, and Matt Gaetz, and hawkish figures like Ted Cruz and Marco Rubio. Vice President JD Vance remains loyally silent, echoing Trump‚Äôs shifting stance. With the base wary of another Middle Eastern conflict, Trump‚Äôs strategy of maximum pressure without direct action is being tested. The bigger battle may not be with Tehran‚Äîbut within MAGA itself, as its identity fractures over the meaning of ‚ÄúAmerica First.‚Äù

title: Amazon's ultimatum: Company tells employees to choose - 30 days to ... or resign in 60 days
content: Amazon is requiring numerous corporate employees to relocate to major hubs like Seattle and Arlington, creating anxiety amidst job insecurity and AI-driven workforce reductions. Affected employees face short deadlines to decide, with no severance offered for those who resign instead of moving. This relocation push intensifies Amazon's in-office requirements and aligns with warnings of upcoming AI-related layoffs.

title: IND vs ENG: Gill's India begin new Test era at Headingley; check out playing XIs
content: Shubman Gill's captaincy began with England winning the toss and electing to bowl in the first Test at Headingley. India debuted Sai Sudharsan and welcomed back Karun Nair after eight years, marking significant changes in their batting lineup.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 above 25,100; Sensex jumps 1,000 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, rallied strongly in trade on Friday. While Nifty50 went above 25,100, BSE Sensex was up over 1,000 points.

title: Karun Nair returns to India‚Äôs Test XI after 2,763 days; Eng win toss and opt to bowl at Headingley
content: India chose to bat first against England. Shubman Gill leads a young team. Karun Nair makes a comeback after seven years. He last played in March 2017. Nair shares his journey and determination. He mentions staying patient and enjoying small things. Nair is excited to play with KL Rahul and Prasidh Krishna. India begins a new World Test Championship cycle.

title: 'He's a snake': Elon Musk calls out Trump insider for sabotaging their relationship
content: Elon Musk ignited a fresh feud by labeling Sergio Gor, a senior advisor to Donald Trump, a "snake" on X. This outburst, triggered by a report questioning Gor's security clearance, unveils the lingering resentment Musk harbors. He blames Gor for damaging his once-strong alliance with Trump. Insiders reveal Gor, wary of Musk's influence as head of the Department of Government Efficiency, strategically sidelined him.

title: War, power, and Les Mis√©rables: 10 facts about Iran's Khamenei
content: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran's Supreme Leader, faces escalating challenges amid Israeli strikes and regional instability. Despite his reclusive nature, Khamenei wields immense power over Iran's military, nuclear program, and foreign policy. He has built a network of regional proxies while suppressing domestic dissent, all while maintaining a surprising appreciation for literature.

title: 'Hand & lantern greatly hurt self-respect of Bihar': PM Modi attacks oppn at Siwan rally
content: Prime Minister Modi inaugurated development projects in Bihar, including flagging off a locomotive for export to Guinea under the 'Make in India' initiative and launching the Vande Bharat Express between Patliputra and Gorakhpur.

title: Sai Sudharsan makes Test debut at Headingley as England opt to bowl first
content: Sai Sudharsan receives his first Test cap as India faces England at Headingley, commencing their new World Test Championship cycle. Shubman Gill, after winning the toss, elected to bat first on a green pitch. The inclusion of the 23-year-old Sudharsan at No.

title: Brandon Aiyuk sends clear message to San Francisco 49ers
content: Kansas City Chiefs may target Brandon Aiyuk before the 2025 season. Aiyuk seeks a long-term deal, around $23 million annually. This move could boost the Chiefs' offense and aid Patrick Mahomes. Aiyuk hinted at leaving the 49ers. Experts suggest the Chiefs will pursue Aiyuk if he is available. Mahomes has been training with young receivers.

title: Ram Kapoor‚Äôs weight loss Diet: He Looses 55 kilos naturally; through this diet
content: Actor Ram Kapoor's remarkable weight loss journey in 2024 saw him shed over 55 kgs naturally in 18 months. Eschewing surgery, the 51-year-old adopted a simple yet effective strategy: two meals a day, no snacking, and no food after 6:30 pm.

title: Dwyane Wade's wife Gabrielle Union shows support for Victoria Mon√©t in heartfelt post
content: Gabrielle Union is set to moderate Victoria Mon√©t's book launch event in Los Angeles for her new children's book, 'Everywhere You Are.' Union reposted Mon√©t's announcement on Instagram, expressing her support for the book, which explores themes of love and connection. The event promises a discussion and Q&A session, with both mothers and authors sharing their insights.

title: Delhi girl dies in Canada: Found dead under mysterious circumstances; was studying at university
content: Tanya Tyagi, an Indian student from Delhi pursuing a Master‚Äôs in Food Safety and Quality at the University of Calgary, died suddenly under mysterious circumstances on June 19, 2025. The Indian Consulate in Vancouver is coordinating with Canadian authorities to assist her bereaved family. While an unverified social media post cited a heart attack as the cause, official details remain unclear. The family has appealed to the Indian government for help in repatriating her body.

title: Wayne Gretzky opens up about how his father tried to stop nickname from sticking
content: Wayne Gretzky's iconic nickname, 'The Great One,' faced initial resistance from his father, Walter. Despite concerns about pressure, the name stuck as Gretzky dominated youth hockey. He later embraced it, exceeding expectations with a record-breaking NHL career. Gretzky also commented on the Edmonton Oilers' recent loss to the Florida Panthers. His journey reflects humility, brilliance, and lasting greatness in hockey.

title: Clash during Kedarnath Yatra: Parking staffers assault pilgrims with sticks
content: A shocking video from the Kedarnath Yatra route shows pilgrims being brutally assaulted with sticks by parking staff at Sitapur. The Sonprayag police swiftly responded to the viral video, confirming the incident and dispatching a team to investigate. The altercation reportedly stemmed from a dispute between pilgrims and parking employees.

title: Air India plane suffers bird hit in Pune: Return flight cancelled
content: An Air India flight, AI-2469, carrying over 100 passengers experienced a bird hit upon landing at Pune airport on Friday morning after arriving from Delhi. Consequently, the return flight, AI-2470 from Pune to Delhi, was cancelled. Air India is providing accommodation, refunds, and alternative travel arrangements for affected passengers, prioritizing safety while addressing the disruption.

title: President moved to tears as differently-abled students sing birthday song for her
content: President Droupadi Murmu celebrated her birthday in Uttarakhand, visibly moved by a song from visually impaired students. Her visit includes laying the foundation for a new public park and opening Rashtrapati Niketan and Tapovan to the public. However, her scheduled trip to Madhya Pradesh for World Sickle Cell Day has been cancelled due to itinerary changes.

title: 'My wife is way more attracted to me now': Carlsen after record rating in freestyle
content: Magnus Carlsen, the chess maestro, has shattered barriers by exceeding a 2900 rating in freestyle chess, a milestone previously unattained in classical chess. This achievement, based on Freestyle Chess organization ratings, marks a new high for Carlsen, surpassing his peak classical rating. Among Indian players, Praggnanandhaa shines at fourth place, followed by other notable players like Arjun Erigaisi and Gukesh.

title: Latest discovery: Are we living inside a black hole? Nasa‚Äôs James Webb findings stun scientists
content: The James Webb Space Telescope has observed a surprising alignment in the spin directions of ancient galaxies, challenging the standard cosmological model. A significant portion of these galaxies rotate in the same direction, suggesting a hidden order in the early universe.

title: ‚ÄòAnti-worker move to downsize...‚Äô: TCS new staff policy slammed; here‚Äôs what IT union said
content: Tata Consultancy Services' new policy mandating 225 billing days and limiting bench time to 35 days faces criticism from the All India IT & ITeS Employees' Union. The union alleges the policy is a disguised attempt to downsize teams and an anti-worker measure.

title: IND vs ENG: Ahead of first Test, Ashwin's wife feels 'mixed emotions'
content: India embark on a new Test era against England at Headingley, fielding a team without Virat Kohli, Rohit Rohit, Cheteshwar Pujara, Ajinkya Rahane, and R Ashwin for the first time since 2011. Shubman Gill captains the side as they begin their World Test Championship cycle.

title: Iran-Israel conflict: India closely watching Chabahar, INSTC routes- why it's important
content: Amidst rising tensions between Iran and Israel, India closely monitors the Chabahar Port and INSTC projects, vital for accessing Afghanistan, Central Asia, and Russia. India's decade-long agreement manages Chabahar Port, offering crucial connectivity bypassing Pakistan.

title: Close call: Ryanair's Boeing 737 jet hits barrier in Greece, wing damaged
content: A Ryanair flight from London Stansted to Kalamata collided with a perimeter barrier while taxiing after landing, causing significant wing damage. Passengers reported a loud bang upon impact and had experienced severe turbulence during the flight's descent. Despite the incident and concerns about the proximity to fuel tanks, all passengers disembarked safely after inspections.

title: New era! Who said what in India's camp ahead of 1st Test vs England - Watch
content: India embarks on a new Test era in England, led by young captain Shubman Gill, following the retirements of veterans like Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, and Ravichandran Ashwin. Despite the inexperience, the team exudes confidence, with senior players like KL Rahul and Ravindra Jadeja highlighting the squad's balance and potential.

title: Explained: What is a cluster bomb? The weapon Iran used in missile strike on Israel
content: Tensions escalate as Israel reports Iran's use of a cluster munition missile against a populated area, marking a concerning development in the ongoing conflict. The attack on Or Yehuda scattered bomblets, raising international alarm due to the weapon's indiscriminate nature and long-term risks to civilians.

title: DGCA warned AI of breaching safety rules on Airbus; what report said
content: Air India faced scrutiny from the DGCA for operating Airbus aircraft with overdue emergency equipment checks, potentially violating safety standards. While Air India is working to rectify the issues, the DGCA warned that non-compliance could lead to suspension of airworthiness certificates and penalties.

title: Air India crash: Suchitra calls survivor ‚Äòinsane‚Äô; deletes post, says ‚Äòmy apologies‚Äô
content: Suchitra Krishnamoorthi faced severe criticism after alleging that Vishwas Kumar Ramesh, the sole survivor of the Ahmedabad Air India plane crash, fabricated his survival story. She questioned his mental state in a now-deleted tweet. Following public backlash and verification of Ramesh's survival by the Civil Hospital, Krishnamoorthi issued a public apology, retracting her statement.

title: Air India cancels seven flights; cites 'maintenance and operational reasons'
content: Air India has cancelled seven flights, including four international and three domestic routes, citing "enhanced maintenance and operational reasons."

title: CLAT third merit list 2025: Check direct link here
content: The Consortium of NLUs has released the third and final CLAT UG 2025 merit list on June 20, 2025, at consortiumofnlus.ac.in. Shortlisted candidates must pay the Rs 20,000 confirmation fee by June 23 and complete university fee payment by June 27. The merit list includes NLU-wise closing ranks and candidate details. With no further centralised counselling rounds, remaining admissions may proceed through institute-level counselling at individual NLUs.

title: More lab coats, fewer sarees? Class 12 science scores of girls breaking old stereotypes
content: A significant rise in Indian girls passing class 12 with science is reshaping academic trends. In 2024, 28.13 lakh girls cleared the science stream, surpassing arts for the first time, signaling a shift towards STEM fields. This growth, driven by improved school facilities and government initiatives, is especially notable among marginalized communities.

title: 'Grabbed shares worth Rs 3,500cr for Rs 1.2cr': Dayanidhi accuses brother of fraud
content: Dayanidhi Maran accuses his brother Kalanithi of illegally acquiring Sun TV shares in 2003, alleging a fraudulent transfer during their uncle's illness. He claims Kalanithi undervalued the shares, diluting original holdings and diverting funds. Dayanidhi threatens legal action, demanding restoration of the original shareholding structure and warning of approaching investigative agencies if his demands are unmet.

title: Israel unleashes fresh strikes across Iran; nuclear facility among targets
content: A week into the Israel-Iran war, hundreds are dead amid intensifying strikes and missile attacks. Israel hit key military and nuclear sites in Tehran, while Iran retaliated, including with a cluster bomb strike on an Israeli hospital. President Trump said he‚Äôll decide within two weeks on possible US military involvement. Talks in Geneva offer a diplomatic opening, but fears of wider regional escalation continue to grow, with tensions at boiling point.

title: IND vs ENG: Cheteshwar Pujara makes suprise visit to nets - Watch
content: Shubman Gill, 25, captains India's Test team for the first time against England at Headingley, marking a new era after Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's retirements. Cheteshwar Pujara, now in broadcasting, visited the team during training. The team, coached by Gautam Gambhir, includes Kuldeep Yadav as the primary spinner. Weather may affect the match, which begins at 3:30 PM IST.

title: Rahane opts against Karun Nair in his India XI for first Test; explains why
content: Ajinkya Rahane has unveiled his predicted India playing eleven for the first Test against England, featuring three debutants: Sai Sudharsan, Dhruv Jurel, and Arshdeep Singh. Shubman Gill will captain the side in the absence of senior players like Kohli and Sharma. Rahane's lineup includes Jaiswal and Rahul as openers, with Gill at number four.

title: Gold price prediction: What's rate outlook for June 20; why 'sell on rise' works?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are currently experiencing a downtrend, with the MCX Gold August Futures contract trading near ‚Çπ98,722. LKP Securities suggests a "Sell on Rise" strategy around ‚Çπ99,000‚Äì‚Çπ99,150, citing EMA resistance, Bollinger Band behavior, and negative MACD indicators.

title: Bihar polls: Cong ramps up quota pitch ahead of PM Modi's visit
content: As PM Modi inaugurates development projects in Bihar, Congress criticizes the NDA government's handling of the proposed 65% reservation for marginalized communities. Jairam Ramesh suggests legislative measures, including constitutional amendments and implementing Article 15(5), to bypass legal hurdles and ensure the reservation's implementation. Congress plans to raise these social justice issues in the upcoming Parliament session.

title: Watch: Karun Nair makes massive revelation ahead of IND vs ENG 1st Test ‚Äì 'I‚Äôm ready to ...'
content: Karun Nair's unwavering determination to represent India in Test cricket fueled his daily purpose after being away from the spotlight since 2017. His comeback against England, the same opponent he last faced, feels like a full circle moment.

content: four teams are 2-1, while the other four are 1-2 . the redwoods jump into a top spot after a 12-11 win over California last week . but the team is winning just 38% of their faceoffs and their offense isn't humming .

title: Ranking the 10 most unbreakable records in college football
content: college football has evolved greatly over the years, but there are some records and accomplishments that have stood the test of time . we've examined the past 75 years in college football, tracing back to the 1950 season, and have ranked the 10 most "unbreakable" records in the sport, listing them in order of least likely to be topped.

content: twenty-eight teams are officially off for the summer, with the frenzied nature of transactions fading into the background . this week's minicamp is the ideal time to take stock of the splash moves around the league . a few potential moves remain on the radar, including a potential Jalen Ramsey trade .

title: Five takeaways from J.J. McCarthy's offseason as Vikings' expected starting QB
content: the world has no shortage of opinions on quarterback J.J. McCarthy . he's not ready to lead the Vikings to super bowl lX in february . "they've really pushed the limits on just what I can handle," he says .

title: Is the Club World Cup important? Yes, just ask the South American teams
content: Boca Juniors fans get ready for the club world cup with chants and drums on Miami beach . the tournament feels unmistakably South American, but in the u.s. it's a global tournament . many of their UEFA counterparts shrug with apathy at the expanded tournament, noting its lack of history .

title: Recruiting intel from Elite 11 Finals and June's final official visit weekend
content: 20 of the nation's top high school quarterbacks convened in Southern California for the Elite 11 Finals . from Tuesday night to Thursday morning, 20 headliners convene in southern California . among the headliners are five-star passers in the 2026 ESPN 300 . a final round of official visits before the recruiting dead period from June 23 to July 31 .

title: Who has the best lineup in MLB? We ranked all 30 teams
content: a panel of our MLB experts ranks every team based on a combination of what we've seen so far and what we knew going into the season . the latest offensive shake-up came in the form of a blockbuster trade, with the Red Sox sending all-Star slugger Rafael Devers to the Giants .

title: Why the Panthers are the nicest 'rats' to win the Stanley Cup (twice)
content: the Florida Panthers defeat the Edmonton Oilers 5-1 to become back-to-back Stanley Cup champions . they're the most antagonistic trash-talking bullies in the national hockey league . opponents decry their actions and fans outright loathe them .

title: Euro 2025 team-by-team preview, predictions, key players, more
content: 16 nations will compete at euro 2025 in Switzerland for the chance to be crowned european champions . the stakes are higher than ever, with prize money more than doubled compared with the previous tournament . each federation receives at least ‚Ç¨1.8 million and required to allocate at least 30% to players .

title: 2025 NBA Finals: Pacers dominate at home in Game 6
content: the Pacers are able to force a game 7 of the NBA Finals . the Thunder were down 8-2 in the first game of the season . they missed their opening six shots, a streak that eventually grew to eight . a timeout was a precursor of an onslaught .
